cause.description:
The Weekend to End Breast Cancer benefiting the BC Cancer Foundation is your chance to discover what it means to be a hero. During one amazing weekend, August 17-19, 2007 thousands of women and men will join forces in Vancouver to walk 60 kilometres and make a real difference in the fight to end breast cancer. The money you raise will benefit the BC Cancer Foundation, a leader in this critical cause. One in nine Canadian women will be diagnosed with breast cancer, maybe even someone special in your life. So we are joining forces to fund breast cancer research and care so that we may end this heartbreaking disease for good. We need your fighting spirit and determination. Register today and make a commitment to this super cause - and become a super you!
1. Supports breakthrough research and compassionate care.
2. Dedicated to earlier diagnosis for breast cancer patients — a critical factor in improving survival.
cause.mission: Benefit breast cancer research and care through the BC Cancer Foundation, an international leader in the fight against cancer.
cause.name: Weekend to End Breast Cancer
